content: I'm considering participating in the Night Market at the old warehouse district, but I need to finalize my product line and pricing. Do you have any tips on how to determine the optimal price for handmade crafts, especially for soap and lotion bars? By the way, I've been pretty active in the local market scene lately - just three weeks ago, I sold 25 jars of my homemade strawberry jam and 15 bouquets of fresh flowers at the Spring Fling Market at the local community center.
